Building codes are essential for ensuring that the built environment is safe during natural disasters such as tropical storms.
In this project, you will choose a building type, identify a relevant guideline, and assess whether these codes should be updated, and if so, how.
You will consider impact on safety, cost, relevant infrastructure, and reliability.

::: {.callout-tip}
Further details will be provided.
You will create and submit a written report.
:::
